body:
I usually want to see new posts in the guilds I follow. Especially since Ruqqus is new and there are too many posts in the guilds I've joined.

I would like the Home page to stay at the last filter settings I used. e.g. If I set it to New, then the next time I go to the Home page, the posts are still sorted by New.
body_html:
I usually want to see new posts in the guilds I follow. Especially since Ruqqus is new and there are too many posts in the guilds I've joined.

I would like the Home page to stay at the last filter settings I used. e.g. If I set it to New, then the next time I go to the Home page, the posts are still sorted by New.
title: Your Home page should remember your "Filter by" and "Sort by" settings

author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.
author.bio_html:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body: Yeah, and what's weird is that your home page is sorted by hot but all is by default sorted by new.
body_html: Yeah, and what's weird is that your home page is sorted by hot but all is by default sorted by new.

guild.description:
The official guild for all things Ruqqus.

Rules:

💻 No promotion of other sites that aren't a fork of Ruqqus

🟪 Ruqqus-related only. This is a community dedicated to Ruqqus meta discussion. Content may involve technology and politics but must have ample context in Ruqqus.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

For press releases, visit +RuqqusPress.

For updates and patch notes, visit +changelog.

For ideas and feedback, visit +BetaFeedback

For bug reports, visit +RuqqusBugs

body: Why don't you want to see different opinions? Are you a member of a group that is harmed by majority opinions?
body_html: Why don't you want to see different opinions? Are you a member of a group that is harmed by majority opinions?

author.bio: A Stay-at-home-mom, TTRPG junkie, and Furry artist.
author.bio_html: A Stay-at-home-mom, TTRPG junkie, and Furry artist.

body: Either this or make a sort or "subscribed" page so that you can see the All homepage, but also just your subscribed guilds posts with minimum effort. While it's beneficial to see and engage with All I'm fairly sure the majority of people prioritize the guilds they joined here first.
body_html: Either this or make a sort or "subscribed" page so that you can see the All homepage, but also just your subscribed guilds posts with minimum effort. While it's beneficial to see and engage with All I'm fairly sure the majority of people prioritize the guilds they joined here first.
